fields.headline: For the record
fields.bodyText: In the latest radio audience reach data, Classic FM has 5.1 million listeners; we said 5.6 million, the figure for the previous quarter. Classic FM presenter Tim Lihoreau raised £75,000, not £40,000, for the Make Some Noise charity. John Suchet, not his actor brother David, is another of the station’s presenters, and Moira Stuart, not Stewart, another (“Will the Classic-ed John Humphrys be easy listening?”, Comment, 27 October, page 50). Write to the Readers’ Editor, the Observer, York Way, London N1 9GU, email observer.readers@observer.co.uk, tel 020 3353 4736
